alert.note: Alert for Greene; Laclede; Lawrence; Polk (Missouri) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Advisory issued May 21 at 2:30PM CDT until May 21 at 10:00PM CDT by NWS Springfield
info.description: ...FLOOD ADVISORY IN EFFECT UNTIL 7 PM CDT THIS EVENING... * WHAT...Flooding caused by excessive rainfall is expected. * WHERE...Portions of central and southwest Missouri, including the following counties, in central Missouri, Camden. In southwest Missouri, Barry, Christian, Dallas, Greene, Laclede, Lawrence, Polk, Stone, Webster and Wright. * WHEN...Until 700 PM CDT. * IMPACTS...Minor flooding in low-lying and poor drainage areas. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 230 PM CDT, Doppler radar indicated heavy rain due to thunderstorms. Minor flooding is ongoing or expected to begin shortly in the advisory area. Between 1 and 3 inches of rain have fallen. - This includes the following low water crossings... Finley River at Johns Ford Road, Lindley Creek at Mathis Road, Wilson`s Creek at Old Limey Road, Flat Creek at Highway C and James River at Bell Ford Road. - Some locations that will experience flooding include... Springfield, Nixa, Ozark, Republic, Aurora, Marshfield, Battlefield and Cassville. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Many flood deaths occur in vehicles.
